name: Sports Bike Racing - Most Wanted Circuit Race 2016
name_original: Sports Bike Racing - Most Wanted Circuit Race 2016
description:
Sports Bike Racing is distinguished from other bike racing games simulators by a faithful reproduction of tactical maneuvers of bike driving on detailed tracks and most intense bike control, easy to get into, and the controls can be managed by even the very young, than when compared to other bike racing games.

Pick the bike of your dream, switch lanes using easy swipe control with auto acceleration as well as auto braking features and enjoy the ultimate bike track race. The bike model you start out with is pretty basic in this game. As you progress, you'll get better, more powerful motorbikes from virtual purchasing shop. Select your monster bike from huge range of motorbikes.

Shift your gear and race in variety of racing tracks with a ton of weather conditions. Game play is very easy and addictive to play. Shift your Bike onto left or right lane by just swapping left or right. Avoid to collision with your racing rivals and furious accidents. Unlock the awesome racing bikes (available in game’s store) and challenge the extreme speed. Upgrade your bikes fuel tank and their life power in order to progress.

Sports Bike Racing is an accurate representation of real bike racing challenge and offer the most realistic motorcycle racing game experience on mobile. If you love motorcycle racing games and are craving a bit of real action and thrill, Sports Bike Racing should definitely be your next move.

How to Play:

- Swipe Right/Left to steer left and right
- Stay away from track hurdles, furious accidents and other bikers
- Collect different pickups to get extra items.
- Complete level objectives and unlock super bikes.

Features:
- Family Friendly motorbike racing game
- Real superbike racing game
- Huge range of riding options
- Accessible for beginners
- Real Super Bike Racing Experience
- Maximum control flexibility
- Enhanced physics engine
- Multi camera views
- Detailed environments with many variations
